faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a wide range of services including web design, digital marketing, and business consulting. Our team of experts can help you grow your business online and reach more customers.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer support team by phone at +1 (555) 123-4567, by email at support@example.com, or through the live chat on our website. We're available Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our services. If you're not satisfied with our work, please contact our customer support team to request a refund.

faqs.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary depending on the scope and complexity. A typical website project takes 4-6 weeks, while marketing campaigns can be set up in 1-2 weeks. We'll provide you with a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. For larger projects, we offer flexible payment plans.
